difficulty_4.question: How do you delete a blocks texture?
choice: Content > Private > Texture Pack Name > Delete
Play > World Name > ... > Options > ... > Texture Pack Name > Delete

difficulty_4.question: How do you rate worlds downloaded from the Community Content?
choice: Content > Community Content > World Name > ... > Rate

difficulty_4.question: How do you report worlds downloaded from the Community Content?
choice: Content > Community Content > World Name > ... > Report

What does Disabled mode for Community Content do?
choice: Disables the Community Content menu entirely
Hides all content listings except your own

difficulty_6.question: What does Strict mode for Community Content do?
choice: Hides all metadata for each listing, except content type and name
Hides all other content forms except worlds

difficulty_6.question: What does Normal mode for Community Content do?
choice: Shows all content listings, except recently added ones
Places the listings with the most downloads at the top

difficulty_6.question: What does Show All mode for Community Content do?
choice: Shows all worlds, and only manually whitelisted listings of other content types
Shows all content listings, except flagged ones
Shows all worlds, and only moderated listings of other content types
